error.message: Call to deprecated function drupal_set_message(). Deprecated in drupal:8.5.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use \Drupal\Core\Messenger\MessengerInterface::addMessage() instead.

Parameter $entity_query of method Drupal\google_vision\Controller\SimilarContentController::__construct() has typehint with deprecated class Drupal\Core\Entity\Query\QueryFactory. Deprecated in drupal:8.3.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use \Drupal\Core\Entity\EntityStorageInterface::getQuery() or \Drupal\Core\Entity\EntityStorageInterface::getAggregateQuery() instead.
